Package com.smarthome.datastuctures

Class LinkedList<T extends Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.smarthome.datastuctures.LinkedList<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements stored in the linked list.
public class LinkedList<T extends Comparable<T>> extends Object
A linked list implementation.

    • peek

      public T peek()
      Retrieves the value of the first element in the list without removing it.
      Returns:
      the value of the first element.

    • peekAndRemove

      public T peekAndRemove()
      Retrieves and removes the value of the first element in the list.
      Returns:
      the value of the first element.

    • peekEndAndRemove

      public T peekEndAndRemove()
      Retrieves and removes the value of the last element in the list.
      Returns:
      the value of the last element.

    • peekEnd

      public T peekEnd()
      Retrieves the value of the last element in the list without removing it.
      Returns:
      the value of the last element.
      Throws:
      EmptyListAccessException - if the list is empty.

    • addEnd

      public void addEnd(T val)
      Adds a new element to the end of the list.
      Parameters:
      val - the value to add to the end of the list.

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex(T val, int index)
      Adds a new element at a specific index in the list.
      Parameters:
      val - the value to add to the list.
      index - the index at which to insert the new element.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds.

      Prints the elements of the list to the console.

      value - the new value for the element.
      Throws:
      EmptyListAccessException - if the list is empty.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of bounds.

      Returns:
